idea-plugin.name: TaskTracker
idea-plugin.description: TaskTracker is a plugin build to research peopleâ€™s behaviour while solving various programming tasks. The plugin tracks all code changes while solving tasks in addition to user actions, performed in IDE. It stores them in .csv files and sends anonymously to the privately hosted server when you submit the solutions. The plugin sends only those code changes that happen in automatically created files for task solving. Any other files are not considered. This data is planned to be used to create an open dataset with additional variables anonymization. Please, see plugin homepage for detailed description and privacy policy.
